name: UpdateEnvironmentEvaluation
description:
Update an environment's evaluation in a project.

Use this tool to update the evaluation details of a specific environment within a given project. It requires the project and evaluation identifiers to locate and modify the corresponding record.

parameters.name: evaluation_id
parameters.description: A UUID string uniquely identifying the evaluation to be updated.

value_schema.description: A UUID string identifying this evaluation.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: The ID of the project you want to update. Obtainable via the /api/projects/ endpoint.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

parameters.name: update_environment_evaluation_details
parameters.description: JSON object containing details for updating the environment evaluation, including fields like 'id', 'name', 'description', 'enabled', 'prompt', 'conditions', 'created_at', 'updated_at', 'created_by', and 'deleted'.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A UUID string identifying this evaluation.

value_schema.description: A UUID string identifying this evaluation.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.
